sentences.sentence: According to Mrs Kaiser Jamil of RRL, "The Argentinian weevil does not attack any other plant and a pair of adult bugs could destroy the weed in 4-5 days."
sentences.translation: 据 RRL 的 Kaiser Jamil 女士所说：“这种阿根廷象鼻虫不会攻击任何其它的植物，并且一对成年的象鼻虫可以在4到5天内清除掉那些杂草。”

sentences.sentence: He told the kaiser that a war between Britain and Germany would be an "unspeakable calamity".
sentences.translation: 他告诉恺撒，英国和德国之间的战争将会是一场“难以言状的灾难”。

sentences.sentence: He told the kaiser that a war between Britain and Germany would be an "unspeakable calamity".
sentences.translation: 他告诉恺撒，英国和德国之间的战争将会是一场“难以言状的灾难”。
